snippet.title: People in the Know: Transitioning to an Insulin Pump
snippet.description: Find tips on switching your child to an insulin pump at Family.com.

snippet.title: Kim: Pros and Cons of the Pump
snippet.description: We still think it was the right thing for Kaitlyn, but after being on the pump for a little while now, we've learned that it's not foolproof.

snippet.title: Kim: Learning How Much We Love the Pump -- the Hard Way
snippet.description: This last month, Kaitlyn's pump decided to malfunction. Luckily, we didn't experience any blood-sugar problems and the company replaced our pump quickly, without any cost. But it was amazing how much we missed having it...

snippet.title: Mud Pie Field
snippet.description: I'm spilling the beans -- er, seeds -- on my Grandma's secret recipe for a Mud Pie Field! Try it ... you'll love it!

snippet.title: Kim: Insulin Pump Tubing Is Not a Chew Toy
snippet.description: How we solved the mystery of one very curious high blood sugar reading.

snippet.title: Kim: Resolution Time: Teaching Kaitlyn to Work Her Pump
snippet.description: Well, it's that time of year again: I need to think about what kinds of goals I want to make for myself. One of the major things on my mind is helping Kaitlyn to begin to learn how to operate her insulin pump.

snippet.title: Teenage Gas Pumping Blues
snippet.description: Teenagers and pumping gas don't mix -- at least in my limited experience thus far. Princess in Waiting and I were headed to Costco to get the bare essentials. You know the type of trip: 80 packages of fruit snacks, 60 f...

snippet.title: How to Pump a Swing
snippet.description: How to teach your child to pump a swing

snippet.title: Mud Island River Park
snippet.description: A walk from the actual headwaters of the mighty Mississippi to its outlet at the Gulf of Mexico would be quite an undertaking, but Mud Island's walk-along scale model...
